TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed SizingType extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies how elements with a bitmap background will adjust to fill a bounds.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The SizingType values represent the return values of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.GetEnumValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method when it is called with an argument value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.EnumProperty?displayProperty=fullName>.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.SizingType FixedSize = int32(0)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.SizingType Stretch = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The background image stretches to fill the bounds.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.SizingType Tile = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The background image repeats the pattern to fill the bounds.
